pullrequest.title: Plotting Palette: Refresh when models are inserted or deleted

content.raw: This is a side effect of how the introspection manager notifies the updates. Right now this happens at every `world::Update()`, which explains why there are no updates when simulation is paused. We could move it to `world::Step()` probably. Testing it...
